name: Rail Maze 2: Train Puzzler
description:
Rail Maze 2 adds even more fun and challenge to Rail Maze world.
Additional Levels, new graphic environments and much more in version 2.0 of Rail Maze.
Rail Maze 2 is the latest game by Spooky House Studios - creators of big hits: Rail Maze and Bubble Explode.
With online levels there is virtually limitless amount of challenging and unique puzzles. Escape PIRATES and GHOSTS on rails, control semaphores and avoid steam and lava. Have a lot of fun!
Now you can also build your own levels and share them with friends and the world!
Features:
100+ puzzles
 Virtually UNLIMITED number of online levels
LAVA and STEAM
 Draggable and switchable rails
PIRATE and GHOST trains
 Super long trains
Underground tunnels
 Semaphores
Level Editor
 3 environments:
- Wild west
- Arctic
- Dungeon
Additional Items available in the game as an InAppPurchase:
- Solutions
- Tickets
- Spins
Get Rail Maze 2 now!
